pr_title: Setup field match executor shared state.

timeline.message: Setup field match executor shared state.

timeline.bodyText: Consider reducing verbosity of function name. get_phrase_splitter() should be sufficient.
timeline.author: geirst

replies.bodyText: That would cause the result of get_phrase_splitter() to be passed as argument to phrase splitter constructor.
replies.author: toregge

timeline.bodyText: Consider reducing verbosity of function name. get_computer_shared_state() should be sufficient.

timeline.message:
Reduce verbosity of method name.
get_field_match_computer_shared_state() -> get_computer_shared_state().
